text: The Office is a British mockumentary sitcom. It was shown on BBC Two. It began on 9 July 2001 and ended on 27 December 2003. It was created, written and directed by Ricky Gervais and Stephen Merchant. It stars Gervais, Martin Freeman, Mackenzie Crook, Lucy Davis, Oliver Chris, Patrick Baladi, Stacey Roca, Ralph Ineson, Stirling Gallacher, Joel Beckett and Ewen MacIntosh. The Office is about David Brent (Gervais), an office manager in Slough, Berkshire, and his employees dealing with his cringe personality. The series was adapted into an American version of the same name, starring Steve Carell. ==Other websites== * Category:2001 British television series debuts Category:2003 British television series endings Category:2000s British sitcoms Category:2000s British workplace television series Category:2000s satirical television series Category:2000s workplace comedy television series Category:BBC television sitcoms Category:Berkshire Category:British satirical television series Category:British workplace comedy television series Category:English-language television programs Category:Office comedy television series
title: The Office (British TV series)
